Name: Food Poppers
About the game: Story: A bunch of food aliens trying to invade planet Cresfthium and you will be playing as head chef to stop the alien from succeeding. A Cutely Drawn and Design Clicker Game. Game Feature: -Rebirth System. -Funny 2d Character Design -Hiring and lvling up your allies hero -Clicking till your hand pain. - (not an indle game) A total of 205 Stage to beat.
